project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project includes: (1) the construction and improvement of two sections of Federal Route I, the main highway on the West Coast of West Malaysia, totalling about 90 miles in length, and supervision by consultants; (2) consulting services for (i) detailed engineering of Route I and connecting roads in the vicinity of Kuala Lumpur, (ii) detailed engineering of about 200 miles of roads, and (iii) town development studies for Kuantan and the region of North-East Negri Sembilan and an urban road improvement study for Kuala Lumpur.
